company.title: The Company
company.the-company:
CENAVE provides the highest quality medical and dental services, being in Rio de Janeiro, a reference in emergency care to the Merchant Navy in Brasil.

Our team of highly skilled, bilingual and internationally recognized professionals provides excellent uninterrupted medical and dental care for insurance companies, cabotage and long-haul navigation and expatriated families.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.our-mission:
To provide the highest quality of medical and dental care for urgent/emergency cases for those directly or indirectly involved in the various stages of cabotage and long-haul navigation.

Attention at any time and with immediate response, being our services provided by all medical and odontology specialties at the highest standard.

activities.title: Our Activities
activities.our-activities:
• Outpatient medical and dental care, urgency and emergency with bilingual professionals, specialized in several areas.
  • Laboratory tests with results in up to 48h, except in special dosage cases.
  • Specialized treatment for large burns.
  • Own mobile ICU to rescue and transfer patients.
  • Medical escort: physician and nurse accompaniment to stable patients during transportation.
  • We quote and supply local market products to ensure the vessel infirmary supply needs.
  • Renewal of the vessel's Medical Chest Certificate.
  • Realization of annual and biannual medical certificates for various flags (Malaysia, Bahamas, IMO etc).
